Title: Requires rates paid for rehabilitation and opioid treatment be pursuant to certain fee schedules published by the office of addiction services and supports
Summary: Requires rates paid for rehabilitation and opioid treatment be pursuant to certain fee schedules published by the office of addiction services and supports.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to requiring rates paid for rehabilitation and opioid treatment be pursuant to certain fee schedules published by the office of addiction services and supports
